/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. A black car is seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the urban landscape of Beijing.
